description:
Microsoft and Apple have decided against taking up board seats at OpenAI. The decision comes as regulatory bodies intensify their scrutiny of big tech’s involvement in AI development and deployment. According to a Bloomberg report on July 10, citing an anonymous source familiar with the matter, Microsoft has officially communicated its withdrawal from the OpenAI... Read more »

The post Microsoft and Apple back away from OpenAI board appeared first on AI News.
title: Microsoft and Apple back away from OpenAI board
